name: Generic Emailer (SMTP)
author: et <et@metasploit.com>
description:
This module can be used to automate email delivery.
        This code is based on Joshua Abraham's email script for social
        engineering.

options.name: WORKSPACE
options.description: Specify the workspace for this module

options.name: VERBOSE
options.description: Display verbose information

options.name: RHOSTS
options.description: The target host(s), range CIDR identifier, or hosts file with syntax 'file:<path>'

options.name: RPORT
options.description: SMTP server port

options.name: SSL
options.description: Negotiate SSL/TLS for outgoing connections

options.name: SSLVersion
options.description: Specify the version of SSL/TLS to be used (Auto, TLS and SSL23 are auto-negotiate) (Accepted: Auto, TLS, SSL23, SSL3, TLS1, TLS1.1, TLS1.2)

options.name: SSLVerifyMode
options.description: SSL verification method (Accepted: CLIENT_ONCE, FAIL_IF_NO_PEER_CERT, NONE, PEER)

options.name: SSLCipher
options.description: String for SSL cipher - "DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA" or "ADH"

options.name: Proxies
options.description: A proxy chain of format type:host:port[,type:host:port][...]

options.name: CPORT
options.description: The local client port

options.name: CHOST
options.description: The local client address

options.name: ConnectTimeout
options.description: Maximum number of seconds to establish a TCP connection

options.name: TCP::max_send_size
options.description: Maxiumum tcp segment size.  (0 = disable)

options.name: TCP::send_delay
options.description: Delays inserted before every send.  (0 = disable)

options.name: RHOST
options.description: SMTP server address

options.name: DATE
options.description: Override the DATE: field with this value

options.name: MAILFROM
options.description: The FROM address of the e-mail

options.name: USERNAME
options.description: SMTP Username for sending email

options.name: PASSWORD
options.description: SMTP Password for sending email

options.name: DOMAIN
options.description: SMTP Domain to EHLO to

options.name: EXE::EICAR
options.description: Generate an EICAR file instead of regular payload exe

options.name: EXE::Custom
options.description: Use custom exe instead of automatically generating a payload exe

options.name: EXE::Path
options.description: The directory in which to look for the executable template

options.name: EXE::Template
options.description: The executable template file name.

options.name: EXE::Inject
options.description: Set to preserve the original EXE function

options.name: EXE::OldMethod
options.description: Set to use the substitution EXE generation method.

options.name: EXE::FallBack
options.description: Use the default template in case the specified one is missing

options.name: MSI::EICAR
options.description: Generate an EICAR file instead of regular payload msi

options.name: MSI::Custom
options.description: Use custom msi instead of automatically generating a payload msi

options.name: MSI::Path
options.description: The directory in which to look for the msi template

options.name: MSI::Template
options.description: The msi template file name

options.name: MSI::UAC
options.description: Create an MSI with a UAC prompt (elevation to SYSTEM if accepted)

options.name: YAML_CONFIG
options.description: Full path to YAML Configuration file
